task.title: Transferring a call
task.shortdesc: When you transfer a call to another person in your office, you have two ways of handling the transfer.

context.p: When you transfer the call without speaking to the person, it is an unannounced transfer. When you speak to the person receiving the transferred call, it is an announced transfer.

step.cmd: Activate the phone to use the transfer feature.
step.info: To activate your phone you must use go to the options screen and turn the transfer feature from off to on. Information about the options screen is in the Options section of this manual.

step.cmd: Test the transfer feature to ensure your phone is working correctly.
step.info: Use the steps below to test your phone
Dial the number manually or using your pre-defined speed dial keys.

info.note: If you announce a call and the person refuses the transfer, do not hang up the phone. Press the transfer button again to retrieve the call on your phone station.

taskbody.postreq: If you encounter any problems with testing your phone, please contact the manufacturer to report your issues
